```{r}
x <- list(
  title = "Date")
y <- list(
  title = "PhenoCam GCC")
p = plot_ly(
    data = df_SH,
    x = ~ date,
    y = ~ gcc_90, #-.336,
    showlegend = FALSE,
    type = 'scatter',
    mode = 'markers', 
     opacity = 0.7,
    name='PhenoCam Shrubs',
    marker=list(color="royalblue")
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    x=~df_GR1$date,
    y=~df_GR1$gcc_90, #-.31,
    mode = "markers",
    type = "scatter",
     opacity = 0.8,
    name='PhenoCam Grass: ibp',
    marker = list(color="goldenrod")

  )%>%
    add_trace(
      y = ~ smooth_gcc_90,
      mode = "lines",
      line = list(width = 2, color = "rgb(120,120,120)"),
      opacity=.2,
      name = "GCC Shrubs",
      showlegend = TRUE
  )%>%
  add_trace(
      y = ~ df_GR1$smooth_gcc_90,
      x=~date,
      mode = "lines",
      marker=list(color="rgb(218,165,32)"),
      line = list(width=2, color = "rgb(218,165,32)"),#, line=list(color='rgb(218,165,32)')),
      opacity=.2,
      name = "GCC Grass",
      showlegend = TRUE
  )%>%

  )
```
